001package org.relationlearn.test;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import org.relationlearn.filters.FilterGroup;
006import org.relationlearn.filters.SequentialFilterGroup;
007import weka.core.Attribute;
008
009public class TestFilterLoader {
010    
011    public static String FILE_PATH = "E:\\Bibliotecas\\Documents\\NetBeansProjects\\RelationLearn\\test_files\\filter_config\\filter-config.xml";
012    
013    public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException {
014        File f = new File(FILE_PATH);
015        FilterGroup fg = new SequentialFilterGroup("test", f);
016        System.out.println(fg.getGroupAttributes().size());
017        System.out.println(fg.getGroupDatasetName());
018        Attribute a = (Attribute) fg.getGroupAttributes().firstElement();
019        System.out.println(a.name());
020        Attribute b = (Attribute) fg.getGroupAttributes().elementAt(1);
021        System.out.println(b.name());
022        Attribute c = (Attribute) fg.getGroupAttributes().elementAt(2);
023        System.out.println(c.name());
024        Attribute d = (Attribute) fg.getGroupAttributes().elementAt(3);
025        System.out.println(d.name());
026        Attribute e = (Attribute) fg.getGroupAttributes().elementAt(4);
027        System.out.println(e.name());
028    }
029
030}
